column1: Uchi////The best sushi experience I've come across in Texas. Been more than a handful of sushi restaurants in Houston and Austin
column2: and this one leads the pack. That being said
column3: this is mainly due to the cooking staff at the bar. They really brought out fun
column6: in our experience with personality & chemistry within their work. Kaleb & Tree
column8: and I can't express how much fun it was dinning with them These are the kind of dining experiences you look for on a celebratory type of night. Truly grateful
